entry.title: Alert! MonoSwap Hacked â€“ Users Advised To Halt Deposits Immediately
entry.summary:
MonoSwap, the distributed exchange and staking platform, said on July 24 that it has experienced a major attack, hence advising customers to take quick fund withdrawals.
The news rocked the crypto community as it underlined the constant dangers in the field of digital currencies. The hack started on July 23 when one of MonoSwapâ€™s engineers unintentionally included a dangerous phishing programme. The developer was enticed into a call using a typical social engineering ploy meant to take advantage of human trustâ€”scammers posing as venture capitalists.
MonoSwap Breached
Over the call, the con artists installed damaging codes on the engineerâ€™s PC. Having access to all the wallets and contracts on the network, this weakness let the attackers empty most of the staked money.
ALERT: Mâ€¦

entry.title: Capo Of Crypto Says Market Is Similar To 2020 Altcoin Season, What Happened Last Time?
entry.summary:
The altcoin season, a name which represents a period where theÂ prices of cryptocurrencies,Â besides Bitcoin, rise rapidly, has become synonymous with the crypto market.Â Despite predictions that the altcoin season was coming, it is yet to begin even after the Bitcoin price hit a new all-time high. However, this incredibly bullish period may not be too far off as one of the most popular analysts in crypto, Capo of Crypto, points out an interesting correlation between the current cycle and the 2020 cycle.
Capo Of Crypto Finds Similarities Between 2020 And 2024
Crypto analyst Capo of Crypto took to X (formerly Twitter) to announce that an altcoin season might be close due to current market trends resembling those from 2020 before the altcoin season began in the last bull run cycle.
The â€¦

entry.title: WATCH: The World's Largest Bitcoin Conference Is Happening in Nashville
entry.summary: The biggest names in Bitcoin are converging in Nashville this week for the Bitcoin 2024 conference, the largest Bitcoin event in the world. Speakers include Donald Trump, Robert F. Kennedy Jr., Cathie Wood, Michael Saylor, and more. Kicking off today is Bitcoin 2024's Industry Day, which will feature presentations and discussions between top business leaders in the Bitcoin space. Industry Day will focus on building Bitcoin-native financial products, Bitcoin's role in traditional banking, corporations putting Bitcoin on their balance sheets and more. Sessions on Bitcoin scaling and layer 2 solutions will also be held. Notable sessions include Dhruv Bansal of Unchained Capital and Allen Farrington, discussing building Bitcoin-native financial products. Caitlin Long of Custodia Bank will present on Bitcoin's role in traditional finance. Jimmy Song, Bruce Fenton, and others will explore "Make Bitcoin Great in America", while executives from MicroStrategy,Â Metaplanet and others will examine corporate Bitcoin treasuries. Industry Day represents a major convergence of Bitcoin business leaders and companies. With increasing institutional adoption, this event offers unparalleled networking and knowledge-sharing for enterprises involved in Bitcoin. Bitcoin 2024's Industry Day will be live-streamed on Bitcoin MagazineÂ YouTubeÂ today, starting at 9:00 AM EST.

entry.title: The Future of Bitcoin in America Will Be Decided at the Ballot Box
entry.summary: As Americans head to the polls this fall, their decision regarding who will lead our country will also determine the fate of crypto here in the United States, and our security, prosperity, and freedom are at stake. This week, I will join President Trump and thousands of crypto market participants in Nashville for Bitcoin 2024, the world's largest Bitcoin conference. This year, the conference is held in my home state at a time that is clearly the tipping point for the future of crypto technology in the U.S. This fall, the future of crypto in America is on the ballot as our nation decides who will lead the Executive and Legislative branches of our nation. The contrast between Democrat and Republican approaches to crypto is stark. The Biden Administration has repeatedly demonstrated its hostiâ€¦

entry.title: MARA Purchases $100 Million of Bitcoin, Adopts HODL Strategy
entry.summary:
MARA (NASDAQ: MARA), a leader in leveraging digital asset compute for energy transformation, has purchased $100 million worth of Bitcoin, bringing its total holdings to over 20,000 BTC, according to a press release sent to Bitcoin Magazine. The company also announced a new treasury policy to adopt a full HODL approach, retaining all Bitcoin mined and making periodic strategic purchases. "Adopting a full HODL strategy reflects our confidence in the long-term value of bitcoin," stated Fred Thiel, MARAâ€™s chairman and CEO. "We believe bitcoin is the worldâ€™s best treasury reserve asset and support the idea of sovereign wealth funds holding it. We encourage governments and corporations to all hold bitcoin as a reserve asset.â€Â Â MARA said it aims to leverage its technological expertise to support Bitcoin and the broader digital asset ecosystem. â€œPrior to last year, the company used to hold all of its bitcoin,â€ said Salman Khan, MARAâ€™s chief financial officer in the press release. â€œGiven Bitcoinâ€™s current tailwinds, including increased institutional support and an improving macro environment, we are once again implementing this strategy and focusing on growing the amount we hold on our balance sheet. Bitcoinâ€™s recent price decline, coupled with the strength of our balance sheet, afforded us an opportunity to add to our holdings. We look forward to continuing to leverage our technological expertise to support Bitcoin and distributed digital asset ecosystems.â€Â Â Just last month, MARA announced that it was using the heat generated from its Bitcoin mining to heat a town of 11,000 in Finland.Â
JUST IN: Marathon is now warming a town of over 11,000 in Finland using heat from #Bitcoin mining ðŸ¤¯ ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡® pic.twitter.com/BUEzj7zqOi â€” Bitcoin Magazine (@BitcoinMagazine) June 20, 2024

entry.title: Institutional Crypto Adoption Takes a Leap with Ethereum ETFs
entry.summary:
The emergence of a new asset is a once-in-a-generation golden opportunity for investors. After the first meltdown, crypto is hot again, and TradFi has big plans for it. The predicted yet unexpectedly swift approval of Ethereum ETFs by the SEC marks a new wave of institutional adoption of digital assets. It amplified the effect on the market from the BTC rally and the debut of its ETF, launched by TradFi heavyweights like Grayscale and Blackrock. Renewed optimism is fostering increased cross-flows between institutions and the digital asset sector. BNY Mellon is expanding its digital assets team. State Street plans to introduce crypto custody services. Franklin Templeton is considering launching a new crypto fund targeting tokens beyond Bitcoin and Ethereum.
Franklin Templeton Weâ€¦

entry.summary: The Nasdaq-listed bitcoin mining company Marathon Digital has purchased $100 million worth of bitcoin and announced that it will adopt a new strategy for holding digital assets. This step brings the company's total holdings of Bitcoin to 20,000BTC. "HODL" Approach In its statement today, the firm mentioned that it will adopt a full HOLD approach, which means to buy and hold, effective immediately regarding its bitcoin treasury policy. The new move allows the firm to retain all the mined bitcoins in its operations and make periodic strategic open-market purchases. Commenting about the latest move, Fred Thiel, Marathon Digitalâ€™s Chairman and CEO, said: â€œAdopting a full HODL strategy reflects our confidence in the long-term value of bitcoin. entry.title: Zoltan Istvan on AI and Human Immortality
entry.summary: Transhumanist Party founder Zoltan Istvan chats with Decrypt's Emerging Technology report Jason Nelson about his journey with transhumanism, running for office, and why he fears AI is outpacing life science and poses a threat to the quest for immortality.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 157 - ROLLBIT FRIDAY!
entry.summary: The German state sells $2bn+ BTC and has under $300m left. BTC ETF sees $800M of inflows, Mr 100 keeps buying. SOL ETF deadline set for 2025, election could be key. SOL stablecoin TVL soars on Tether & PYUSD growth. Firedancer sees the first accepted block on SOL testnet. ETH ETFs finally expected next week. Monthly active crypto addresses top 100m. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville conference. Golman Sachs to launch 3 tokenization projects. Short squeeze in altcoins sees TIA rise 80% from lows. MOG leads top memes coins, BONK flips WIF. Farming interest shifts to Berachain & Monad.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token
entry.summary:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.
In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process heâ€™s still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isnâ€™t done with the project. Instead, heâ€™s planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 156 - ETH ON THE RISE!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$147m. ETH outperforms with ETF optimism. Germany government moves 2375 BTC again. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Goldman Sachs to launch 3 tokenisation projects. Realised losses similar to COVID period. Staked ETH nears ATH. CEX stablecoin volume hits 7-month low. CFTC says 70-80% of crypto not securities. Base hardfork improves compression 20-30%. BitMEX pleads guilty to AML violation. APTOS & SEI see weak attendance at ETHcc event.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 155 - ETFs SAVE THE DAY
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: $216m. $654m of inflows into ETFs over 3 days. BTC transaction fees hit 4-year low. German state moves $300m BTC, holdings $1bn. SOL flips ETH for 7d DEX volumes. SOL Firedancer sees first accepted block on testnet. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Crypto monthly active addresses tops 100m. Biden crypto veto now expected to be upheld. Tech coalition urges Biden to back crypto. People face security threats at ETHCC. DBS sees 300% growth in crypto trading. PYUSD now 7th largest stable coin. China may have already sold BTC holdings. Elliptic exposes $11bn USDT scam network. StanChart in talks to buy Howardâ€™s crypto fund. Polychain accuses former employee of side deals. SEI leads altcoins as it launches v2 mainnet beta. TIA rises 80% from lows on short squeeze. TON to release L2 based on Polygonâ€™s tech stack.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 154 - THE CELEBS ARE BACK...
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$295m. ETF inflows fight German selling, BTC unchanged. German government sells $900m BTC, moves more. Rate of sales implies German supply sold this week. ETH ETFs set to launch next week. Election may affect SOL ETF decision March 2025. Raydium beats ETH for 24hr fees. BTC â€˜power lawâ€™ points to 300% gain by 2025. BTC in 80 day post-halving re-accumulation phase. BlackRock treasury fund hits $500m. Republicans release pro-crypto policy. Senate urges blockchain tests for national security. Drop in BTC mining difficulty â€˜comparable to FTXâ€™. MetaMask introduces delegation toolkit. 25 major projects to launch tokens in H2 2025.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 153 - A WEAK WEEKEND
entry.summary: BTC sinks 5% then bounces back to unchanged. $58-60k the main area for â€˜shorts to defendâ€™. Crypto funds saw $441m inflows last week. German government transfers 1000 BTC to sell. Crypto sentiment at lowest in over a year. ETH spot premium hits local highs. Japanese firm Metaplanet buys $2.5m BTC. Expect more miners merging: TeraWulf CEO. SOL Firedancer bug bounty goes live. GLM transfers $117m of ETH treasury to exchanges. 98% of coins have topped this cycle: Kang. ETH ETF should come in next 2 weeks: Geraci. Crypto progress disheartening: Copeland.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 152 - JOINED BY DEEZE!
entry.summary: BTC hits $54k, set for worst week in over year. Mt. Gox begins to move BTC & make distributions. German government continues to sell holdings. Worst day for BTC liquidations since FTX. Justin Sun says he is willing to buy German BTC. German MP calls on it to stop selling BTC. $52k super-trend support line eyed for BTC. Funding rates turn extremely negative across majors. Only 6 mining machines profitable below $56k. Coinbase spot buyers emerge to counter drop. Total3 hits RSI lows only hit 4 times in last 4 years. Fear & Greed index hits lowest since Jan 2023. Capo remains bullish. Real selling begins at $38k: Schiff. Coinbase continue to fight for Genslerâ€™s emails. Circle mints $250m USDC on SOL. Symbiotic hits $1bn TVL. Taiwan Mobile may open crypto exchange. Unisat completes funding round with Binance.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 151 - BTC TAPS THE 60K LINE
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: -$14m. BTC drops to $60k, CME gap filed again. $1bn shorts liquidated if we rally to $62.6k. Pump(.)fun surpasses ETH for revenue. ETH will outperform BTC after ETF launch: K33. ETH ETF may be delayed even further. BTC heading to $150k: Fundstrat. Chainlink & Fidelity partner for fund data on-chain. USDC protects the dollar: Circle ad. Robinhood considers crypto futures in US & EU. Another BTC miner looks to IPO in US. Vitalik bullish on prediction markets. Sentient Labs raises $85m for AI on SOL. Mantra to tokenise $500m of real estate. TAO falls 15% after security breach. Crypto scams & hacks hit $572m in Q2.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 150 - BILLY TO A BILLY?
entry.summary: BTC ETF inflows hit highest in a month. ETH ETF inflows to hit $5bn in 6 months: Gemini. ETH public funds see largest outflow since 2022. SOL hits new ATH for monthly economic value. Sellers starting to look exhausted: Crypto Quant. Silvergate sued by SEC, settles for $63m. Circle gets stablecoin license for USDC in EU. US DoJ ironically chooses Coinbase for custody. Bitcoin miner aims for $16bn IPO. Bitfarms increases BTC mining amid takeover attempt. DOT has 2 year runway amid large burn. DOT ecosystem builders turn against team. PENDLE TVL falls $3bn as restaking rewards end. PayPal stablecoin goes live on Jupiter. At least $600m altcoin unlocks this month.
